title: Deployment - New Backup Solution
description: A project involves replacing a client's old, unreliable backup system with a new, modern BCDR (Business Continuity and Disaster Recovery) solution.

tasks.description: Deploy the new BCDR appliance on the client's network.
tasks.expected_outcome: The new appliance is installed and configured.

tasks.description: Install the new backup agent on all servers and configure the backup jobs.
tasks.expected_outcome: All servers are configured to be backed up by the new system.

tasks.description: Run initial full backups for all servers.
After a week of successful backups, decommission the old backup system.
tasks.expected_outcome: The client is fully transitioned to the new, more reliable backup solution.
